net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.filter

Class HibernateSessionHandlerFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.filter.HibernateSessionHandlerFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter, InitializingBean

    public class HibernateSessionHandlerFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter, InitializingBean
    Configures hibernate sessions for implementations of HibernateSessionAcceptor in a web context. This filter can be configured in Spring or used as a conventional filter configured in a web.xml.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
